sections.title: I Think For You
sections.text: Remeber the whale that you met last month who asked you to circle back in a few weeks? I do. Here is the thread and an email for you to easily restart the conversation.

sections.title: Stay One Step Ahead
sections.text: I've already thought about that proposal that you sent to your soon to be biggest customer and wrote a few emails for you to choose from to followup.

sections.title: Focus On Closing
sections.text: Data entry is a distraction. With me all you need to do is work with people. I automatically build profiles of your customers and take notes on when you connect with them, what you send them, and what you talk about.
